review: I own Apple TVs, Google ChromeCast, Roku 1000-3000, and both the Amazon Fire TV and Stick. This is by far my favorite.Only things I would suggest changed is the security for buying is either on or off. Even things you already bought require the code, so the kids will drive you bonkers.There is also not a clean section of prime vs paid for content.Other than that... I LOVE it.
